Well hello, I'm Bryan. A lot of my time is spent building things for the web, but sometimes I like to brew my own beer or play drums. What I really like doing is spending time with my beautiful wife and two lovely kids. Right now I call Seattle home but I have lived in a number of places including Prague.

Introducing Honestify

Mar 13, 2013

For a while, I've been curious about learning to build bookmarklets and browser plugins. I figured that it couldn't be too difficult, but I didn't really have anything particular to build. So it just sat in the back of my mind until I saw a tweet by Ethan Schoonover. While I know that he was just joking, it seemed like a perfect excuse to take to learning something new. Read more

First off, I am a big fan of Jeremy Keith. He is a very smart guy and find myself having to think twice when I find our views differ, but in the spirit of keeping the discussion going I will press on. Read more
